item.title: How to build personal blog using GitHub Pages and Hugo
item.description: You want to build a personal blog but don’t want to spend too much time building everything from scratch? Me too! After some research I got to know there are several static site generators out there and the most used generators are: Jekyll, Hexo and Hugo. All of them work perfectly with GitHub Pages. I chose Hugo as my site generator, and it worked perfectly. What is Hugo Hugo is a static site generator written in Go.
